dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer21 - Samsung
dmca.body:
Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [  Samsung  ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [    Samsung ] / :
 

Markertek Video Supply             Product: DVD-HD960
 
violation: http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.markertek.com/productimage/big/dvd-hd960.jpg&size=2&dhm=83816c56&hl=en
 
BargainOffers.com         Product: DVD-HD960
 
violation: http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://bargainoffers.com/catalog/images/samsung_dvd-hd960.gif&size=2&dhm=9d6860be&hl=en
  
TVAuthority       Product: DVD-HD960
 
violation: http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.tvauthority.com/itemimages/DVDHD960.jpg&size=2&dhm=1fba1dc7&hl=en
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [ Gary Rosenberg ]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 9006]
City and State: [Coral Springs, FL]
Zip: [33075 ]
Email [google@netenforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 7/14/06]
 

Truthfully,
/S/:  Gary Rosenberg
